name: Grandpa's Game
description:
Grandpa can be hard to talk to. We're practically in two different worlds, two different eras.

But through this simple game, we've forged a connection.

And through our time together, two things are for certain:

  • I am his grandchild.
  • And he can always beat me at chess.

Use mouse click to input moves.

Use ears to listen to music.

Use bottom to sit still.
